actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to prohibit Federal assistance to rental housing projects where tenants are not allowed to have pets, or to local governments which do not permit pets in rental housing.

summary.text: Prohibits Federal assistance to rental housing projects where tenants are not allowed to have pets, or to local governments which do not permit pets in rental housing. Permits the removal of household pets which constitute a threat to the health or safety of the residents or neighbors of the housing project.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit Federal assistance to rental housing projects where tenants are not allowed to have pets, or to local governments which do not permit pets in rental housing.
